nodes.documentation: @dev Creates a GeodeSale attached to an already deployed Gem smart contract

@notice Calculates number of geodes to sell and sells them by
minting correspondent number of gems to the sender
nodes.name: getGeodes

nodes.documentation: @dev calculates a price to buy several geodes
nodes.name: calculateGeodesPrice

nodes.documentation: @dev calculates number of geodes to sell by the value sent
nodes.name: calculateGeodesToSell
